verses.text: Co masanil cajan onh t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, conh b'itanec t'a Jehová t'a tzalajk'olal.
Caq'uequem co b'a t'ay t'a tzalajk'olal. Cotanhec t'a yichanh yet' av yic tzalajk'olal.
Cham val cojtacaneli to a Jehová Dios toni. A' ix onh b'oani, yuj chi' yiconh. Ha onh schonhab' onh tik, icha val scalnel caji.
Conh ochec t'a puerta yic tzonh och t'a yol yamaq'uil scajnub' yic scalec wach' lolonel t'ay. Caq'ek yuj diosal t'ay, scalanec wach' lolonel t'ay.
Yujto a Jehová wach' toni. Ha svach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a junelnhej, malaj b'aj max yaq'uelk'och tas syala'.
